com.viaoa.process

Class OACronProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.process.OACronProcessor

  • public class OACronProcessor
extends Object
    Used to manage OACron jobs, and uses OAExecutorService when it is time to process the cron.
    Author:
    vvia
